User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Avoid indexing backend/API and auth pages
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /register
Disallow: /forgot-password
Disallow: /reset-password
Disallow: /dashboard
Disallow: /patients
Disallow: /appointments
Disallow: /prescriptions
Disallow: /pharmacy
Disallow: /ledger
Disallow: /billing
Disallow: /staff
Disallow: /reports
Disallow: /settings
Disallow: /blogs/manage
